title: Looking for Top/Jungle/ADC & SUP for Proctal Vision
body:
Looking for people to join a semi-serious ranked team.
I main {{champion:103}} MID so im looking for players for other roles.

Our current needs are:
Permanent roles.
- TOP
- JUNGLER
- ADC
- SUPPORT

Requirements:

Skype.
16+ years of age (or mature).
Active Monday-Friday Arvos (AUS Time) & majority of the day on some weekends during tournaments.
Listen to leaders/shot callers.
*Preferably have Silver+ experience (not required).

Application process:
 Please add; PV RedJaffas

Message me with;
Preferred Role:
Skype:
Rank:
Why you want to join:

Will reply ASAP

replies.body:
Preferred Role:Jg
Skype: Yes
Rank: S1 now
Why you want to join: Looking for a semi serious team

IGN: Mistaken

Main Role: jungle

Main Champion: Kha'Zix, Lee-Sin, Nautalis, Rek'sai , Rengar

How often you're on: 1pm-2am, Everyday.

Rank: Gold 3

Age:17

Skype/teamspeak/curseVoice: Yes

Why you want to play for my team: To improve as a player and acquire valuable teamwork skills.

Preferred role: Jungle
Skype: yes
Rank: Gold 2
Why I wish to join: Looking for a serious/semi-serious 5s team.

Preferred Role: Support/ Jungle 
Skype: yes 
Rank: started in S2, now in Bronze :(
Why you want to join: solo q can be quite boring and i would like to get better with a team, as well as having some fun 
i main {{champion:201}} {{champion:12}} support :)

Preferred role: Top
Skype: Yes (what gamer doesn't use it?)
Rank: B2
Why you want to join: Well I really enjoy playing this game but I hate all the "mid or feed" then they proceed to feed in mid. I really want to get better and grow in this game as well as meet other people that love this game as much as I do. I want to play with a serious ranked team, one that is willing to put in the time and effort to train and practice out team co-ordination and overall skill. I know I'm not a pro (just look at my horrible rank) but I want to develop my skills with a group of people willing to put in the effort and that eventually want to do something with this game. I.E participating in some local tournaments eventually to see where we're at.

Favourite top champs: {{champion:58}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:68}}

Preferred Role: Jungle
Skype: Yeah
Rank: Plat 5
Why you want to join: I play heaps and solo queue is a bit of a drag. Im pretty serious about getting better and ive been wanting to join a team for a while

Preferred: Adc,mid,top
Skype: Yes
Rank: Bronze 2
Why you want to join: Sick of all of the feeders and trolls, want to play my preferred roles with out the "adc or feed" ; wanting to play with a serious ranked team. All of my mates aren't too good.
-I have also been playing since late season 3, i rushed ranked as soon as i hit lvl 30 leading to my current rank.... Bronze 2.
